alert.note: Alert for Howard (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 6:50PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Howard County through 715 PM CDT... At 649 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cotesfield, or 18 miles southeast of Ord, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elba and Cotesfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
